overview: These hot suit-daddies know how to get the job done even if it's not the one they're getting paid for. In Unsuitable, take a behind-the-scenes look at the hot sales force at Tough Tools, Inc. They're having a bad sales year and big boss Zak Spears is not happy. How does he handle it? By letting his men hear it... and feel it. These nine hot guys are under a lot of pressure and they relieve that pressure the best that they can by getting their huge man sticks out of their suits and using them on each other.
title: Real Men 20: Unsuitable
